summary: 1984  was a leap year starting on Sunday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1984  was a leap year starting on Sunday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1984th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 984th year of the 2nd millennium, the 84th year of the 20th century, and the 5th year of the 1980s decade.
